FuncDef: This command includes the Nas-Port-Id AVP.
CLIs: nas-port-id [ prefix-type { none | user-string } ] [ prefix-string <prefix-string> ] [ suffix-type { circuit-id | none | remote-id | user-string } ] [ suffix-string <suffix-string> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies what type of prefix is added to the NAS-Port-Id attribute if included in Nas-Port-Id AVP messages. Values-none - No prefix is added.
Specifies the user configurable string up to 8 characters, to be added as a prefix.
Specifies the suffix to be added to the NAS-Port attribute NAS-Port AVP. Values-none - No suffix is added.
Specifies the string, up to 64 characters, to be added as suffix.
